alternative: first king of southern kingdom of Juda
For 3 years Jeoahaz and Jeoash reigned together
reign only recorded 6 months, probably only established 792 BCE

text: Israel in the wilderness 1513 to 1473 BCE – 40 years
479 years until the temple construction – 1 Kings 6:1
7 times – 2520 years to the Messianic Kingdom 1914 CE (Daniel 4:23)
Exodus from Egypt on Nisan 14th, 1513 BCE
First Missionary Journey of Paul, c. 47-48 C.E. with Barnabas and John Mark
Second Missionary Journey c. 49-52 C.E with Silas (Silvanus)
Third Missionary Journey c. 52-56 C.E. then arrested and imprisoned in Rome 58 C.E.
